TopicTitle: Ckan always gets an error message!

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I want to install Real Solar System and Ckan downloads it to 50%-70% and then i get this error message:

It says: The prozess can not acces blablabla because it is used by another one!
just a thought but are you running the game when you try and download it? if it tries to access any files while they're in use then it will throw an error back I think.
Looks like Real SolarSystem mod is the fault,i now installed real fuel,kas,fas,universal storage... and i get no error message.strange
restart your PC.. then try. should kill any background programs that are utilizing it,.
Only Real Solar System gives me this Error!
Update:I installed the new Version of Ckan and now everthing works fine! Thread can be locked.

I have always had down load failures when the source in Ckan for the down load is kerbalstuff. I don't know why ..it just doesn't download properly from there.

And when I go to web site it always asks me to register even if i'm actually logged in... so it could be a site entry problem?
